channel.title: In the News – WBEC Pacific | Women's Business Enterprise Council Pacific

image.title: In the News – WBEC Pacific | Women's Business Enterprise Council Pacific

item.title: Janice Greene: A woman everywhere, all at once
item.dc:creator: David
item.description:
Janice Greene is always focused on the role each person plays in the bigger picture, she said.
Throughout her 39-year career at Boeing, and now in her current position as the President and CEO of Women’s Business Enterprise Council Pacific, Greene said if one role doesn’t work, then the rest of it won’t work.
“You have to be able to see the whole big picture,” Greene said, “how things fit together and that everybody is playing an important role.”
